name: live-streaming-demo
description: * (install express) Open a terminal in the folder and run - `npm install express` * (add your API key) Edit the `api.json` inside the uncompressed folder and replace the emoji with your key * (select service) in the same `api.json` file, edit the `service` field to choose your avatar type, use `talks` for an avatar made from an image or `clips` to use a premade HQ avatar from a video
